subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The third-round leader at the Northern Trust Open, Bill Haas would be a repeat champion if he holds on, a feat never accomplished by his father, Jay, a nine-time PGA Tour winner.
snippet: The third-round leader at the Northern Trust Open, Bill Haas would be a repeat champion if he holds on, a feat never accomplished by his father, Jay, a nine-time PGA Tour winner.
